ЁЯРШ
Battle of Koppam

Rajadhiraja was a brave warrior who led his army from the battlefield. He died fighting on the back of an elephant in the famous Battle of Koppam against the Chalukyas. However, his brother Rajendra II immediately took command and won the battle.

ЁЯФе
Sack of Kalyani

Earlier, he had sacked the Chalukyan capital Kalyani and brought a dvarapal (gatekeeper) idol from there to Thanjavur (Darasuram). He also performed the Ashvamedha sacrifice.
